item.title: Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket ‘Shining Revelry’ expansion launches March 27
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/pokemon-trading-card-game-pocket-shining-revelry-expansion-launches-march-27

  • Smartphone

Over 110 new cards like Shiny Charizard ex, Shiny Lucario ex, and more.

Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket expansion “Shining Revelry” will launch on March 26 at 10:00 p.m. PT / March 27 at 1:00 a.m. ET, The Pokemon Company announced.

The description reads: “Uniquely colored Shiny Pokemon are debuting alongside Pokemon originally discovered in the Paldea region. Shining Revelry features over 110 cards including exciting Pokemon ex, new Trainers, and a gorgeous immersive card ready to pull you into the wondrous world of Pokemon.”

Pokemon Trading Card Game Pocket is available now for iOS via App Store and Android via Google Play.

Watch a trailer for the expansion below.

Expansion “Shining Revelry” Announce Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Devolver Digital and Francis Coulombe announce pixel art survival horror RPG Look Outside for PC, now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/03/devolver-digital-and-francis-coulombe-announce-pixel-art-survival-horror-rpg-look-outside-for-pc-now-available

  • PC

Or maybe don't look outside.

Publisher Devolver Digital and developer Francis Coulombe have announced pixel art survival horror RPG Look Outside for PC (Steam). It is available now for $9.99.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

Look Outside is a survival horror RPG set in a single apartment building. A mysterious event turns anyone who looks out the window into grotesque monsters, leaving the world in absolute chaos. Scavenge the building to seek food, supplies, and weapons while encountering strange characters—human and otherwise.

Key Features

  • Survival Horror and Resource Management – Plan tense expeditions outside your apartment as you fend off grotesque monsters dwelling in and around your building. Return to your home with gathered resources and partial answers to your questions to recuperate by playing games, making dinner, crafting tools, and getting to know your neighbors turned allies.
  • Inventive Turn-Based Combat – Clash with over 150 hand-crafted creatures in turn-based combat that accounts for space between you and your foes as you wield makeshift weapons and items you’ve gathered in the corridors of the building.
  • Impeccable Body Horror Aesthetic – Meet your macabre fate in a bizarre world teeming with an unconventional and occasionally psychotic cast of characters – some of which you can recruit and offer safe harbor in your apartment as the mystery unravels.
  • Small, Experimental, and Unwaveringly Weird – Offering three to six hours of playtime with a dozen boss encounters, friends to recruit, and visitors to invite back to your home, Look Outside offers different experiences for every player on their way to uncover several different endings.

Watch the launch trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Launch Trailer
